name: Cats Squared Up
description:
Mini Jam #127
Theme:  Cats²
Limitation: Use this Mini Jam's Color Palette

    

Challenge your friends in Local co-op!

CONTROLS Keyboard (Controller):
Select - Enter  (Start)
Move - A, D (Left & Right D-Pad)
Jump -  W (Up D-Pad)

Punch - Left Arrow ( X )
Kick - Right Arrow ( B )
Smash - Down Arrow (A )
Block - Move Backwards

Crouch - S (Down D-Pad)
Attack while crouch S + Arrow Keys

    

Cats Squared Up was made using Godot,
 Aseprite, and FL Studio.

 CREDITS

Artist - Jenna Wing-Hu (Memao)
Developer - Bryan Reed (Bronsky)
 Developer - Ross Root (SleepingRobot)
 SFX - Tyler Young (Young Tango)

Free Music used:
 https://opengameart.org/content/to-the-streets
 https://opengameart.org/content/back-alley-hero

Sleeping Robot Games
